cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper initialization of the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause ASN.1 parsing errors and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Asn1_verbosity 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致 ASN.1 解析錯誤，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
